hero.title: Chowman (Indiranagar): An Oriental Culinary Journey Awaits
hero.subtitle: Immerse yourself in the authentic flavors of China and Thailand, expertly crafted for an unforgettable dining experience right here in Indiranagar.

about.title: The Chowman (Indiranagar) Story
about.paragraph1: Since its inception, Chowman has been a beacon for lovers of exquisite Oriental cuisine, and Chowman (Indiranagar) proudly continues this legacy. We are dedicated to bringing the vibrant and diverse flavors of China and Thailand to your table, prepared with traditional techniques and a passion for culinary excellence.
about.paragraph2: At Chowman (Indiranagar), every dish tells a story of authentic ingredients, skilled chefs, and a commitment to quality. From our succulent dim sums to aromatic curries, we strive to create a dining experience that transports you to the heart of Asia, making every visit a memorable celebration of taste and culture.
